briefTitle: Data Base Project for Acquisition of Cancer Patient Data in Practices and Ambulant Therapy
officialTitle: Data Base Project for Acquisition of Cancer Patient Data in Practices and Ambulant Therapy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Anti-cancer treatments (Course of the disease and type of applied anti-cancer therapies. Assessment of guidelines' implementation)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years and older
* Tumor disease (carcinoma of either breast, ovary, lung, colon, stomach, pancreas, rectum or plasmacytoma)
* Written informed consent

Exclusion Criteria: none
